description: Determinant of the n X n Hankel matrix whose entries are s_2 (i+j), 0 <= i, j < n, where s_2 is the sum of the base-2 bits.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..350
maple: with(LinearAlgebra):wt:= proc(n) local m, t; m:=n; t:=0;       while m>0 do t:= t+irem(m, 2, 'm') od; t     end:a:= n-> Determinant(Matrix(n, (i, j)-> wt(i+j-2))):seq(a(n), n=0..40);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, May 25 2013
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<0, 0, matdet( matrix( n, n, i, j, 2*i + 2*j - 4 - valuation( (2*i + 2*j - 4)!, 2))))} /* _Michael Somos_, Feb 08 2011 */
author: _Jeffrey Shallit_, Sep 04 2000
extensions: More terms from _Alois P. Heinz_, May 25 2013
